title: Zhen Hun Jie 4th Season
synopsis:
Cao Yanbing and his group are framed by the God Martial Spirit Legion led by Huangfu Longdou after the destruction of the Reed Catkins Tower, and they are all wanted by the Spirit World. Later, in order to find out the whereabouts of his mother, Cao Yanbing deliberately gets captured in the death prison “Qianji Black Rakshasa”, which is guarded by Hall of Fame. To save Cao Yanbing, his companions gather support from various sides, and all forces converge on Hall of Fame, launching an extraordinary battle of the elite.

(Source: Bilibili)
